descs.desc: Adds buttons to the equipment management screen to load
and save your EGO loadout. Convenient for when you're using
the memory repository a lot and it's annoying to reassign all
If EGO is lost in battle, or an agent cannot equip it due to their stats,
it will simply be unassigned. Also, this mod identifies agents by name, so
it will not work if you have multiple agents with the same name.
